title: Mack Truck Builder
description: Lyft is vocal about its mission to be the friendlier, fairer option in the rideshare space. In anticipation of going public, Lyft needed to show continued growth by attracting new riders and drivers. Increasing both at the same time would mean more rides, shorter wait times, and higher revenue.
Work & Co redesigned Lyft.com with these values and goals in mind, inspiring more people to sign up or apply to drive with Airro Studios.

title: CSA
byline: Holding the future to a higher standard.
description: CSA Group has a long but hidden history in making the products we use on a daily basis, safer for all. The CSA mark is found on products ranging from sinks and homewares to some of the most complex electronics in the world.

As an insitution with over 100 years in making the world a safer place, CSA needed to renew their global story and global presence by revisiting the past. The goal? A brand update that holds the future of CSA to a higher standard.
With the collaboration of brand strategists and CSA stakeholders, the identity was renewed and a new brand expression was created to embody the characteristcs of the brand.

TextBlock.title: Logo Mark & Identity
TextBlock.text: Renewing the logo meant revisiting past incarnations of the CSA mark. As a symbol that appears on thousands of products in the world, we opted to design a mark that retained the timeless qualities of previous versions but refine and refactor the mark both in metrics and optically.

TextBlock.title: Expression System
TextBlock.text: From color, typeface selection, iconography and photography - all aspects of the brand were run through the strategic lens. A color pallete was selected that represented credibility and trust but also carry the gravitas of immediacy. Typefaces were selected to deliver the the practicality and elegance of the brand.

TextBlock.title: Brand Collateral
TextBlock.text: CSA Group marketing material across all channels - from print to digital were produced making sure elements across all materials were consistent in both visual and langauge.

title: FineLite
description: Studies have shown, interior lighting is critical to human functioning affecting beings both pyschologically and physiologically. FineLite partnered with Airro Studio to a design a lighting system that allows for optimial control of commercial lighting to provide optimial lighting conditions to patients, students and other commercial applications.
The goal? Design a lighting system that is easy to deploy and setup with the aid of an iOS application. With FineTune, lighting is continiously tuneable with little to no assistance from a techncian.

To build an app, I first understood the context and the behaviors of the audience at hand. With partnering with Airro Studios, we designed an app that is intutive as other IOT applications. I took care in insuring onboarding to on-going scheduling was easy.

TextBlock.title: User Journey & Controller
TextBlock.text: As an application that compliments technician installed hardware, task flow was an important consideration when designing the overall application. After a FineTune unit is installed, the app has to allow for a user to seemless discover a FineTune receiver, set initial parameters like naming, zones and initial lighting settings. The interface to control lighting is also fundamental to a great experience. The UI where an operator would be doing most of their work needed to feel intuitive and natural.
